summary: Diff adds a KYL-themed React frontend with an AppShell (header + responsive sidebar/sheet navigation), Overview hero page, and section components for About Mediation, Legislative Knowledge, and Scenarios. It also adds an empty Motoko backend actor. Several requirements cannot be fully verified due to truncation, and the required generated image assets are not shown as added in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: App header clearly displays “Know Your Law (KYL)”
missing_requirements.reason: Header text shows “Know Your Law” but does not include “(KYL)” in the visible header branding.

missing_requirements.requirement: “About Mediation” section shows exactly 4 named sub-sections with structured English content (headings + bullets) for each
missing_requirements.reason: Only the first two requested sub-sections are visible in the truncated diff; the remaining two (“Role of Mediator”, “Mediation Process”) are not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: “Scenarios where mediation will take place” contains exactly 5 scenario sub-sections, each with clearly labeled “Scenario” and “How mediation resolves it” blocks
missing_requirements.reason: Only three scenarios are visible in the truncated diff; cannot confirm the total is exactly five and that all meet the required structure.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate required static images into frontend/public/assets/generated with filenames kyl-logo.dim_512x512.png and kyl-hero.dim_1600x600.png
missing_requirements.reason: UI references these image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/hooks and actor creation/query invalidation logic
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly disallows third-party auth providers/social logins, and does not request authentication at all; diff adds Internet Identity provider and actor hooks plumbing.
REQ-1 specifies three top-level sections; diff adds an additional top-level navigation item and section id ('overview').
Not requested in BuildRequest; adds an external referral link in the footer.
